description: Implement Convex queries and mutations to replace Dexie operations. Create task and category functions including support for recurring tasks, series operations, and proper timestamp handling.

tasks.title: Create tasks query function
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a Convex query to list all tasks, replacing db.tasks.toArray().
acceptanceCriteria: Query returns all tasks from ctx.db.query('tasks').collect()

tasks.title: Create task create mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to create tasks with support for both regular and recurring tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Accept args: title (string), description (optional string), completed (boolean), priority (enum), dueDateMs (optional number), subtasks (optional array), categoryIds (optional array of category IDs), recurrence (optional object)
Set createdAtMs and updatedAtMs to current timestamp
Handle recurring tasks: set isRecurringParent=true for parent task

tasks.title: Create task update mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to update existing tasks with automatic timestamp tracking.
acceptanceCriteria: Accept args: id (task ID) and partial task fields
Automatically set updatedAtMs to current timestamp

tasks.title: Create task remove mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to delete tasks with undo support.
acceptanceCriteria: Retrieve task before deletion with ctx.db.get()
Return deleted task object for undo functionality

tasks.title: Create toggle complete mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to toggle task completion status with undo support.
acceptanceCriteria: Retrieve task and throw error if not found
Toggle completed field to opposite value
Return old completion status for undo

tasks.title: Create delete series mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to delete all instances of a recurring task series.
acceptanceCriteria: Query all instances with by_recurringParentId index
Delete all instances in a loop

tasks.title: Create update series mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to update recurring task series, affecting parent and future non-customized instances.
acceptanceCriteria: Accept args: parentId (task ID), updates (partial task object)
Query all instances with by_recurringParentId index
Update only future instances (instanceDateMs >= now) that are not customized
Set updatedAtMs on all updated records

tasks.title: Create generate instances mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to generate recurring task instances for a lookahead window.
acceptanceCriteria: Retrieve parent task with recurrence configuration
Generate instances using recurrence utility functions
Insert instances with proper instanceDateMs and recurringParentId

tasks.title: Create categories query function
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a Convex query to list all categories.
acceptanceCriteria: Query returns all categories from ctx.db.query('categories').collect()

tasks.title: Create category create mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to create new categories.

tasks.title: Create category remove mutation
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a mutation to delete categories.

tasks.title: Move recurrence utils to shared location
tasks.description: As a developer, I need recurrence utility functions that work with Convex (timestamp-based, no browser APIs).
acceptanceCriteria: Modify src/utils/recurrenceUtils.ts to work with number (ms) instead of Date objects
Ensure functions can be imported by Convex functions
Existing client code still works (or is updated)

tasks.title: Verify function mapping completeness
tasks.description: As a developer, I need to confirm all Dexie operations have Convex equivalents.
acceptanceCriteria: All mutations return appropriate values for undo support
